info.title: Application View Container
info.description:
Builds an application view container element. This will be filled asynchronously on content.modified with the application view assigned, unless it is set for preloading.
The application must be initialized before creating an application container.

method.name: __construct
method.description: Defines the application id and the view name.

method.name: build
method.description: Builds the application container with the given parameters.

parameter.name: $attr
parameter.description: An array of parameters to be sent to the server by GET method.

parameter.name: $startup
parameter.description: Defines whether this container will be invoked to be filled up at startup (on the next content.modified trigger)

parameter.name: $containerID
parameter.description: The id of the container DOMElement.

parameter.name: $preload
parameter.description: Set the container to preload the content synchronously.
